EmailTemplate.name: TSS_UserConference_August_VNS
EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON - Client Presentations and Custom Reports Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Countdown to TriCON September 13 - 16 l Boston, Massachusetts
There's still time to register for TriCON: TriTech's Annual User Conference, taking place September 13-16 at the Boston Park Plaza Hotel in Boston, Massachusetts. This year's event will once again showcase over 12 hours of innovative solutions and best practices from your fellow peers.
Some of the client presentations include:
- Hennepin County EMS and Dallas PD: Social Media Strategies in Public Safety - EMSA: EMS Data Interoperability - Charleston County Consolidated Dispatch Center: A Behind- the-Scenes look at the Consolidation Process - Ventura County Fire: VisiNet Mobile - Where the Rubber Meets the Road - Columbia-Richland County: Geo Best Practices
Visit the TriCON website and Blog for all the latest conference updates. Don't miss this must-see event!
Pre-Conference Workshop: Builiding Ad-Hoc Custom Reports
Date: Tuesday, Sept. 13 from 2 p.m. to 5 p.m.
Cost: $200 (Hands on workshop limited to 12 individuals.)
Abstract: With a growing importance placed on accountability and efficiency, management is tasked with building reports and dashboards to improve operations.This hands-on workshop will help you turn your VisiCAD data into easy-to-read, interactive reports through Crystal Reports. Click here to view the workshop agenda.
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
